titles.title: A bill to exclude from income certain wages of spouses of members of the Armed Forces serving in combat zones.
A bill to exclude from income certain wages of spouses of members of the Armed Forces serving in combat zones.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income the wages and self-employment income of spouses of members of the Armed Forces serving in a combat zone or hospitalized while serving in a combat zone.
